v1-confidence: Fetch the confidence of a specific block
v1-appdata: Fetch the appdata of a specific block
v1-mode: Fetch the operating mode of the light client instance
v1-status: Fetch the status of the latest block processed by the light client
v2-status: Fetch current status and active modes of the light client
v2-blocks: Fetch specified block status and confidence if applicable
v2-blocks-header: Fetch the header for a specifc block if available
v2-subscriptions: Get started with the Websocket Avail LC API
v2-ws-subscription-id: Initiate a Websocket connection to the Avail LC API
v2-ws-version: Request Avail Light Client version data
v2-ws-status: Request current Avail Light Client status data
